thread.title: Chrissy Teigen Already Gave Out The Cutest Award Of Oscar Night
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen Already Gave Out The Cutest Award Of Oscar Night

author: Jillian Capewell
title: Chrissy Teigen Already Gave Out The Cutest Award Of Oscar Night
text:
Chrissy Teigen Already Gave Out The Cutest Award Of Oscar Night TFW you casually hand your household Oscar to your kid. — christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 26, 2017 
In Chrissy Teigen ’s mind, the Oscar for cutest baby was no contest. Before heading to the 89th annual Academy Awards , the model and mom decided to have some award show fun on social media. 
“And the award for Baby of the Year goes to ... baby Luna!” Teigen says in a video posted to Twitter Sunday. We’re guessing the statue in the video is the one Teigen’s husband John Legend won for his song “Glory,” created with Common for the film “Selma.” (Luna’s will probably come in the mail.) 
Clearly, this is a major upset for all other babies hoping to snag the win this year, but let’s be honest: Baby Luna put out some outstanding work in the last year. A post shared by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Feb 19, 2017 at 10:32am PST A post shared by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Feb 17, 2017 at 4:33pm PST
